articles.author: Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: American journalist Evan Gershkovich marks one year in Russian detention - CNN
articles.description: American journalist Evan Gershkovich marked the grim milestone of one year in Russian detention on Friday as US efforts have yet to secure his release.
articles.content:
American journalist Evan Gershkovich marked the grim milestone of one year in Russian detention on Friday as US efforts have yet to secure his release.

articles.title: Caught on cam: Russia strikes the 5th US-made Abrams tank of Ukraine with drone in Donbass - The Times of India
articles.description: The Russian military recently targeted and destroyed another U.S.-supplied M1 Abrams tank operated by Ukrainian forces. This destruction occurred when a kamikaze drone rammed into the American-made tank near the village of Berdych, as captured in foo
